data.eml:eml: Description of two new species of the leafhopper genus Karachiota (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Dikraneurini) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jiao, Meng, Yang, Maofa (2015): Description of two new species of the leafhopper genus Karachiota (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Dikraneurini) from China. Zootaxa 3915 (3): 446-450, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3915.3.10
